attributes.action: Involve the police to investigate expense irregularities
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
have the police investigate all MP's and ministers found to have made false and unlawfull claims for expenses and prosecute them using the same laws that govern the rest of the population in the UK.
It seems that anyone in government can say sorry and be void from actual prosecution whilst the rest of the population would be incacerated for committing the same offence.

One Law for all in a democracy.

rejection.details: The PM cannot instruct the police and CPS in this way.  Anyone can refer a matter to the police for investigation and they have the discretion whether to investigate the matter or not.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
